translations: n．冲刺者：在体育比赛中，尤指橄榄球比赛中，负责冲刺、突破防线的运动员。
· The team's rushers are very fast and agile.
这个队的冲刺者非常快速且敏捷。

sentences.sentence: In addition to turning Shanghai into an international carnival, the World Expo 2010 has produced "expo rushers" since its opening on May 1, chinanews.com reported.
sentences.translation: 据中新网报道，上海世博会5月1日开园，成为一个国际性的欢乐嘉年华。
